category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Relieve Toxicity

indications: Diarrhea due to high fever, enteritis, toothache, eczema, sores and boils

action.primary: Dispels extravasated Blood and relieves pain

notes: Parts used are the flower, fruit and root.
The flower and fruit treat dysentery and enteritis.
The root treats nephritis, hepatitis, leukorrhea, traumatic injury, ulcers on the legs and feet and hemorrhoidal swelling and pain.
